english: (orn., T, Raphus, cucullatus, formerly, Didus, ineptus, extinct, dodo)
as dead as a dodo (idiom, adj)
to go the way of the dodo bird (coll)
to have gone the way of the dodo (idiom)

german: Dodo und ihr Bruder (Ernst, Ludwig, Kirchner)

english: (bot., T, Sideroxylon, grandiflorum, syn, Calvaria, major, dodo tree)
